caption.p: Characterization of viral clone MR766 GFP on Vero cells. In ( A), the example of infectious virus foci developed after a focus-forming assay using anti-GFP antibody. To visualize infectious virus plaques, the cell monolayer was counterstained with crystal violet. In ( B), cells were infected 24 h with MR766 GFP at an m.o.i. of 1. The GFP-positive cells (GFP) stained with anti-E MAb 4G2 (4G2) were analyzed by flow cytometry analysis. In ( C), mean fluorescent intensity (MFI) of MR766 GFP-infected cells (MR766 GFP), as determined by flow cytometry analysis. Control: mock-infected Vero cells.
